title: Unmapped
description: Lexie loves her lists and lives a perfectly programmed life. Manu hates anything confining and lives his life blindly. When Lexie decides to take a trip around Europe, after an incident that makes her realize that her life is not as happy and satisfying as she thinks, Manu joins her eventhough he's certain that he'll regret it! Can two seemingly different people survive their differences? Will Lexie learn how it feels to wander Unmapped in life and love and will Manu succeed to put his chaotic life back in order? Join Manu and Lexie in a life changing journey with the most beautiful European cities in the background!
author: Nektaria Markaki
